problem_names:
lemmas [code_pred_intro] = typeVal[where lev = Low] typeVal[where lev = High]
  typeVar
  typeBinOp1 typeBinOp2[where lev = Low] typeBinOp2[where lev = High] typeBinOp3[where lev = Low]

lemmas [code_pred_intro] = typeSkip[where T=Low] typeSkip[where T=High]
  typeAssH[where T = Low] typeAssH[where T=High]
  typeAssL typeSeq typeWhile typeIf typeConvert
translations:
lemmas [code_pred_intro] = typeVal[where lev = Low] typeVal[where lev = High]
  typeVar
  typeBinOp1 typeBinOp2[where lev = Low] typeBinOp2[where lev = High] typeBinOp3[where lev = Low]

code_pred (modes: i => i => o => bool as compute_secExprTyping,
  i => i => i => bool as check_secExprTyping) secExprTyping
proof -
case secExprTyping
from secExprTyping.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x \<turnstile> xa : xb
show thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  x \<turnstile> xa : xb

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis
proof
fix \<Gamma> V lev
assume "x = \<Gamma>" "xa = Val V" "xb = lev"
from secExprTyping(1-2) this

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>x = ?\<Gamma>; xa = Val ?V; xb = Low\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis
  \<lbrakk>x = ?\<Gamma>'; xa = Val ?Va; xb = High\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis
  x = \<Gamma>
  xa = Val V
  xb = lev
show thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>x = ?\<Gamma>; xa = Val ?V; xb = Low\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis
  \<lbrakk>x = ?\<Gamma>'; xa = Val ?Va; xb = High\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis
  x = \<Gamma>
  xa = Val V
  xb = lev

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis
by (cases lev) auto
next
fix \<Gamma> Vn lev
assume "x = \<Gamma>" "xa = Var Vn" "xb = lev" "\<Gamma> Vn = Some lev"
from secExprTyping(3) this

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>x = ?\<Gamma>'; xa = Var ?Vn; xb = ?lev;
   ?\<Gamma>' ?Vn = Some ?lev\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis
  x = \<Gamma>
  xa = Var Vn
  xb = lev
  \<Gamma> Vn = Some lev
show thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>x = ?\<Gamma>'; xa = Var ?Vn; xb = ?lev;
   ?\<Gamma>' ?Vn = Some ?lev\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis
  x = \<Gamma>
  xa = Var Vn
  xb = lev
  \<Gamma> Vn = Some lev

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis
by (auto simp add: Predicate.eq_is_eq)
next
fix \<Gamma> e1 e2 bop

assume "x = \<Gamma>" "xa = e1\<guillemotleft>bop\<guillemotright> e2" "xb = Low"
      "\<Gamma> \<turnstile> e1 : Low" "\<Gamma> \<turnstile> e2 : Low"
from secExprTyping(4) this

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lbrakk>x = ?\<Gamma>';
   xa = ?e1.0 \<guillemotleft>?bop\<guillemotright> ?e2.0; xb = Low;
   ?\<Gamma>' \<turnstile> ?e1.0 : Low;
   ?\<Gamma>' \<turnstile> ?e2.0 : Low\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis
  x = \<Gamma>
  xa = e1 \<guillemotleft>bop\<guillemotright> e2
  xb = Low
  \<Gamma> \<turnstile> e1 : Low
  \<Gamma> \<turnstile> e2 : Low
show thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>x = ?\<Gamma>';
   xa = ?e1.0 \<guillemotleft>?bop\<guillemotright> ?e2.0; xb = Low;
   ?\<Gamma>' \<turnstile> ?e1.0 : Low;
   ?\<Gamma>' \<turnstile> ?e2.0 : Low\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> thesis
  x = \<Gamma>
  xa = e1 \<guillemotleft>bop\<guillemotright> e2
  xb = Low
  \<Gamma> \<turnstile> e1 : Low
  \<Gamma> \<turnstile> e2 : Low

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis
by auto
next
fix \<Gamma> e1 e2 lev bop

assume "x = \<Gamma>" "xa = e1\<guillemotleft>bop\<guillemotright> e2" "xb = High"
    "\<Gamma> \<turnstile> e1 : High" "\<Gamma> \<turnstile> e2 : lev"
from secExprTyping(5-6) this
show thesis
by (cases lev) (auto)
next
fix \<Gamma> e1 e2 lev bop

assume "x = \<Gamma>" "xa = e1\<guillemotleft>bop\<guillemotright> e2" "xb = High"
    "\<Gamma> \<turnstile> e1 : lev" "\<Gamma> \<turnstile> e2 : High"

proof (state)
this:
  x = \<Gamma>
  xa = e1 \<guillemotleft>bop\<guillemotright> e2
  xb = High
  \<Gamma> \<turnstile> e1 : lev
  \<Gamma> \<turnstile> e2 : High

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>\<Gamma> e1 lev e2 bop.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>;
        xa = e1 \<guillemotleft>bop\<guillemotright> e2; xb = High;
        \<Gamma> \<turnstile> e1 : lev;
        \<Gamma> \<turnstile> e2 : High\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
from secExprTyping(6-7) this
show thesis
by (cases lev) (auto)

proof (state)
this:
  thesis

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

proof (state)
this:
  thesis

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

lemmas [code_pred_intro] = typeSkip[where T=Low] typeSkip[where T=High]
  typeAssH[where T = Low] typeAssH[where T=High]
  typeAssL typeSeq typeWhile typeIf typeConvert

code_pred (modes: i => o => i => bool as compute_secComTyping,
  i => i => i => bool as check_secComTyping) secComTyping
proof -
case secComTyping
from secComTyping.prems

proof (chain)
picking this:
  x,xa \<turnstile> xb
show thesis

proof (prove)
using this:
  x,xa \<turnstile> xb

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. thesis
proof

proof (state)
goal (7 subgoals):
 1. \<And>\<Gamma> T.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = T; xb = Skip\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 2. \<And>\<Gamma> V T e.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = T; xb = V:=e;
        \<Gamma> V = Some High\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 3. \<And>\<Gamma> e V.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = Low; xb = V:=e;
        \<Gamma> \<turnstile> e : Low; \<Gamma> V = Some Low\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 4. \<And>\<Gamma> T c1 c2.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = T; xb = c1;; c2;
        \<Gamma>,T \<turnstile> c1; \<Gamma>,T \<turnstile> c2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 5. \<And>\<Gamma> b T c.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = T; xb = while (b) c;
        \<Gamma> \<turnstile> b : T; \<Gamma>,T \<turnstile> c\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 6. \<And>\<Gamma> b T c1 c2.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = T; xb = if (b) c1 else c2;
        \<Gamma> \<turnstile> b : T; \<Gamma>,T \<turnstile> c1;
        \<Gamma>,T \<turnstile> c2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 7. \<And>\<Gamma> c.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = Low; xb = c;
        \<Gamma>,High \<turnstile> c\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
fix \<Gamma> T

proof (state)
goal (7 subgoals):
 1. \<And>\<Gamma> T.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = T; xb = Skip\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 2. \<And>\<Gamma> V T e.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = T; xb = V:=e;
        \<Gamma> V = Some High\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 3. \<And>\<Gamma> e V.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = Low; xb = V:=e;
        \<Gamma> \<turnstile> e : Low; \<Gamma> V = Some Low\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 4. \<And>\<Gamma> T c1 c2.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = T; xb = c1;; c2;
        \<Gamma>,T \<turnstile> c1; \<Gamma>,T \<turnstile> c2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 5. \<And>\<Gamma> b T c.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = T; xb = while (b) c;
        \<Gamma> \<turnstile> b : T; \<Gamma>,T \<turnstile> c\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 6. \<And>\<Gamma> b T c1 c2.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = T; xb = if (b) c1 else c2;
        \<Gamma> \<turnstile> b : T; \<Gamma>,T \<turnstile> c1;
        \<Gamma>,T \<turnstile> c2\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
 7. \<And>\<Gamma> c.
       \<lbrakk>x = \<Gamma>; xa = Low; xb = c;
        \<Gamma>,High \<turnstile> c\<rbrakk>
       \<Longrightarrow> thesis
assume "x = \<Gamma>" "xa = T" "xb = Skip"

proof (state)
this:
  x = \<Gamma>
  xa = T
  xb = Skip

goal (7 subgoals):

       \<Longrightarrow> thesis

picking this:

  \<lbrakk>x = ?\<Gamma>'; xa = High; xb = Skip\<rbrakk>

thm secComTyping.equation
subsection \<open>An example taken from Volpano, Smith, Irvine\<close>
definition "com = if (Var ''x'' \<guillemotleft>Eq\<guillemotright> Val (Intg 1)) (''y'' :=  Val (Intg 1)) else (''y'' := Val (Intg 0))"
definition "Env = map_of [(''x'', High), (''y'', High)]"
values "{T. Env \<turnstile> (Var ''x'' \<guillemotleft>Eq\<guillemotright> Val (Intg 1)): T}"
value "Env, High \<turnstile> com"
value "Env, Low \<turnstile> com"
values 1 "{T. Env, T \<turnstile> com}"
definition "Env' = map_of [(''x'', Low), (''y'', High)]"
value "Env', Low \<turnstile> com"
value "Env', High \<turnstile> com"
values 1 "{T. Env, T \<turnstile> com}"
end
